title: Cannot upgrade to open-beta phase
body:
I went to the legacy client, and i saw a big Upgrade to beta button. I pressed it. it showed this, the upgrade now button is blank and i cannot press it. Someone got some tips? 

http://imgur.com/a/Jm3X9

replies.body:
The button shows as grayed out if you've already upgraded to the Beta Client. Hit the launch button and you should launch right into the Beta login.

Let me know if this helped.

Try and relaunch your launcher.
This fixed it for me :)
